tgt_original: 持過去當來今現在心入耶？

src_original: tatra yad atītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ /  yad annāgataṃ tad asaṃprāptaṃ /  pratyutpannasya sthitir nāsti /
tgt_original: 過去為盡甫當來未至今現在無所住也。

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapārūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham aniketaṃ /
cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /  na paśyanti na drakṣyanti /  kīdṛśas tasya pracāro draṣṭavyaḥ /  anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā dharmāḥ pravartante /
tgt_original: 」佛語迦葉言： 「諸佛亦不見心者，本無所有、無所因也，自作是因緣，自得是死生。

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /  cittaṃ hi kāśyapa vidyutsadṛśaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgānavasthitam /  cittaṃ hi kāśyapākāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate / pe //  cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pāpamitrasadṛśaṃ sarvaduṣkhasaṃjananatayā / pe /
tgt_original: 心譬如飛鳥獼猴不適止一處也，心所因不適止一處也。 譬如畫師各各賦彩心各各異，如是隨行所為。 譬如王於眾人中為上，心於諸功德中無上。

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /  tathā nīlamakṣikāsadṛśam aśucau śucisaṃjñayā /
tgt_original: 譬如蒼蠅在糞上住自以為淨，心亦如是入愛欲中自以為淨。
